# Erc1155.setApprovalForAll() method

Set approval for all NFTs

## Example

```javascript
const operator = "{{wallet_address}}";
await contract.erc1155.setApprovalForAll(operator, true);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
setApprovalForAll(operator: string, approved: boolean): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type    | Description                  |
| --------- | ------- | ---------------------------- |
| operator  | string  | the operator's address       |
| approved  | boolean | whether to approve or remove |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;

## Remarks

Approve or remove operator as an operator for the caller. Operators can call transferFrom or safeTransferFrom for any token owned by the caller.
